item.title: Running a Local Go Web App in Docker
item.description: In this post, I walk through creating a simple Go web app that runs in a Docker container, and lists the hostname of the container it’s running in. I chose Go as I’ve recently gotten started writing code in Go and it’s a lot of fun to work with. The container will install Go, so there is no need to install it locally on your machine. Docker is a prerequisite, however.
